results.label: Coursera
results.description: Coursera is an educational for-profit company founded by professors Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller from Stanford University, located in Mountain View, California. It has recently received $16 million of Series A venture capital from L. John Doerr at Kleiner, Perkins, Caufield & Byers and Scott Sandell of New Enterprise Associates Coursera says it is "committed to making the best education in the world freely available to any person who seeks it".
